name: Bomber Bob in Pentagon Capers
overview: "inspired" by the arcade game Bomb Jack, popular at the time. Jump your caped superhero Bomber Bob around a series of 50 rooms in the Pentagon, avoiding meanies and collecting bombs planted by evil Kaptain Kleptor. Each room is titled with an appalling pun. Rooms have a time limit as well. Like many Speccy games of the time, it starts out very easy but quickly becomes insanely difficult.
